name: Radion
description:
The radial brick breaker! Has 2 10-round tables with an additional 3 that can be unlocked, plus an unlockable 100-round Survival mode, that disables extra lives, plus adds a time limit, to really challenge your skills! Also has 14 achievements to unlock and online high scores!

How to play:

  • Use the mouse to move the paddle 
  • Use <Backspace> to bring up the pause menu or un-pause the game
